title: BBC Local Live: Greater Manchester and east Cheshire on Wednesday 22 February 2017 - BBC News
summary: manchester man identified as is suicide bomber in iraq .
man who racially abused us veteran on manchester tram given suspended sentence .
thousands call for resignation of bolton council leader .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates from greater manchester and east cheshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back from 08:00 on thursday with the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across the region .

documents.title: weather : rain and strong winds
text: it will be rainy overnight ahead of strong winds in the morning with the expected arrival storm doris .
more on bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: the premier league show : mata reveals a desire to present match of the day
text: manchester united 's juan mata tells gary lineker he would love to take over as the presenter of match of the day when he retires from playing football .

documents.title: manchester racist tram attack : aaron cauchi given suspended jail term
text: a man who admitted racially abusing a us army veteran on a tram and abusing two other men has been given a suspended prison sentence .
when juan jasso challenged the trio 's use of foul language , he was verbally attacked and had beer thrown at him .
the incident on 28 june was filmed .
aaron cauchi , 19 , of little hulton , salford was sentenced to 16 weeks in jail , suspended for two years .
he was also banned from manchester 's metrolink tram network for two years .

documents.title: ryan giggs : 'too many foreign managers in british football '
text: ryan giggs believes there are too many foreign coaches and managers in the premier league , with british talent not being given a chance .
the former manchester united and wales winger insists the number of foreign bosses is stifling homegrown managers ' opportunities to progress .
giggs , 43 , was caretaker boss for four games at united after david moyes ' sacking in 2014 .
`` i do n't think there 's enough [ british managers ] at the moment , '' he said , adding :
i think it is [ important british coaches get a chance ] .
there 's a lot of top quality foreign coaches in the premier league , but there 's also a lot of quality british coaches and managers out there .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: british is bomber was 'peaceful and gentle ' before guantanamo bay
text: the family of an is fighter from manchester who carried out a suicide attack in iraq said he was `` peaceful and gentle '' before he was sent to guantanamo bay and disputed he received £ 1m in compensation from the british government .
jamal al-harith , 50 , who blew himself up at an iraqi army base in mosul this week was originally known as ronald fiddler .

the family said in a statement `` the jamal they knew up until 2001 '' when he was taken to guantanamo bay would not have become involved with a `` des organisation such as the so-called islamic state .
the family who last heard from him in 2014 said he was `` utterly changed by the physical and mental cruelty and the inhuman treatment he endured for two years at guantanamo bay '' .
the family added the £ 1m compensation was a `` group settlement including costs for four innocent people '' including al-harith freed from guantanamo bay in 2004 .

documents.title: j.k.rowling confirms manchester was the birthplace of quidditch
text: the magical sport of quidditch was invented in manchester , author j.k. rowling has confirmed .

documents.title: travel : delays on m62 greater manchester eastbound
text: there is very slow traffic on the m62 junction 19 eastbound between heywood and rochdale .
there are also delays on the a34 anson road and dickenson road in rusholme which is affecting stockport road and stanley grove .
to report traffic and travel incidents dial 0300 123 0184 at any time .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: who would make blossoms ' fantasy football band ?
text: ahead of tonight 's ceremony , stockport 's brit award nominees blossoms have which footballers they 'd like to see in their fantasy football band .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: cricket : hameed withdraws from mcc squad to have sinus operation
text: england and lancashire batsman haseeb hameed has withdrawn from the mcc squad to take on middlesex in abu dhabi next month to have a sinus operation .
he said it was `` disappointing but having the operation in early march , i will be fit for the start of the season with lancashire '' .
news : @ twitterid has withdrawn from the mcc squad to take on middlesex due to an upcoming sinus surgery .
@ haseebhameed97 : it 's something i 've needed to do for a while , and it 's a good time to do it .
i 'll be fit for the start of the season . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire
text: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire

documents.title: schoolgirl 'told oldham footballer she was 14 '
text: a schoolgirl told former oldham athletic footballer accused of sexually abusing and grooming her that she was 14 years old , a court has heard .
midfielder jack tuohy , 20 , denies five sexual offences against a child in 2015 .
the girl told manchester minshull street crown court she `` told a little lie '' about her age on facebook which resulted in her being listed as 17 .
but she remembered telling mr tuohy on snapchat she was 14 , the jury heard .

documents.title: storm doris arrives from the west
text: wind and heavy rain on the way .
# stormdoris will arrive from the west on thursday , bringing damaging winds and heavy rain with heavy snowfall in the north
what time is strome doris is starting
hi caroline , we 'd be happy to check this in relation to your local area .
which area would you like us to check ?

documents.title: skate park funded by 'landfill tax ' opens
text: a new £ 85k skate park in handforth , nr wilmslow , seems to have gone down a treat .
money from landfill taxes helped pay for it .

text: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire

documents.title: would a move to china work for rooney ?
text: would a move to china work for rooney ?
author: Richard Conway
Sports news correspondent

documents.title: british is bomber 'did n't deserve compensation '
text: a british is fighter , from manchester , who carried out a suicide attack in iraq should never have received a penny in compensation , a former independent reviewer of uk terrorism legislation has said .
jamal al-harith reportedly received £ 1m from the british government after being freed from guantanamo bay in 2004 .
lord carlile said the payment was wrong as al-harith was `` plainly a terrorist '' .
former prime minister tony blair has defended his government 's decision to free him from guantanamo .
al-harith , who was 50 , was originally known as ronald fiddler .

documents.title: the rugby team using ballet in training
text: wigan warriors ' youth team have started taking weekly ballet classes .
it 's to help improve the rugby league players ' strength and posture and reduce injury to their ankles and knees .
the team say they 're enjoying it and they 've noticed a difference .
their ballet teacher hopes more professional teams in the uk will take up ballet .
author: Newsround

documents.title: weather : cloud and rain
text: turning windy from the south overnight with cloud and rain , heavy and at times persistent .
gradually spreading north-eastwards , turning to snow at times , mostly over higher ground in the north .

documents.title: more than 5,500 police officers given tablets or smart phones
text: greater manchester police has finished its programme of equipping officers and other staff with mobile devices .
so far , more than 5,600 people on the force have been given smart phones or tablets to cut down on the need to go back to the office to complete paperwork .
the roll-out started in april and gmp says since then , 19,000 witness statements have been submitted electronically , allowing officers to spend more time on the beat

documents.title: delays on metrolink at bury
text: there are delayed services on the bury line .
due to an earlier incident , we are currently experiencing minor delays on the bury line .
sorry for any inconvenience caused .

documents.title: football : wayne rooney not guaranteed to stay at man utd , says mourinho
text: manchester united boss jose mourinho has not ruled out the prospect of wayne rooney leaving the club this month .
the 31-year-old england forward , who scored his 250th united goal last month to become the club 's record scorer , has been linked with a move to china in recent weeks .
the chinese super league 's transfer window shuts next week and mourinho was asked if the club captain would still be at old trafford by then .
`` you have to ask him , '' mourinho said .
of course i ca n't guarantee [ he will be here ] .
i ca n't guarantee that i 'm here next week , how can i guarantee that a player is here next season ?
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: bolton thief jailed despite apology from dock to one of his victims
text: a prolific thief offered an apology to one of his victims from the dock at bolton crown court before he was jailed for 44 months .
author: Bolton News

documents.title: metrolink ban for man after tram abuse
text: a man has been banned from travelling on manchester 's metrolink for two years and given a suspended sentence for his part in racially abusing a us army veteran on a tram .
juan jasso was verbally attacked and had beer thrown at him for tackling a trio for using foul language on the metrolink tram on 28 june .
aaron cauchi , 19 , from little hulton in salford , was the last of three people to be sentenced in connection with the incident .
he has been given a 16-week jail sentence , which has been suspended for two years , and must complete 300 hours of unpaid work within 12 months .

documents.title: handforth skate park opens
text: a new £ 85,000 skate park has opened in handforth , cheshire .
much of the project has been funded by the landfill communities fund - a scheme that lets waste companies keep some of their landfill tax bill to help local projects .
john smith , chair of friends of stanley hall park , said the effort of doing up the park has been worth it .

documents.title: champions league : man city must score at monaco or go out , says guardiola
text: manchester city `` will be eliminated '' if they do not score in the second leg of their champions league last-16 tie with monaco , says manager pep guardiola .
city , who came from behind twice to beat the french league leaders 5-3 in a pulsating first leg at the etihad stadium , play the return on 15 march .
`` we are going to fly to monaco to score as many goals as possible , '' guardiola said afterwards .
`` that is my target .
it is impossible to progress if we do n't score a goal . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire
text: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire

documents.title: uk bomber 's path from guantanamo to iraq
text: a british is fighter , from manchester , who died in a suicide bomb attack on iraqi forces in mosul is a former guantanamo bay detainee .
the self-styled islamic state group said two days ago that abu-zakariya al-britani detonated a car bomb at an iraqi army base in tal gaysum , south-west of mosul .
he is believed to have been originally known as ronald fiddler .
frank gardner reports .

documents.title: man 's body found near bridge in warrington
text: a man 's body has been found near to the kingsway bridge in warrington this morning .
detectives were called to howley lane near to warrington rowing club at 07:30 .
emergency services are at the scene and police are currently trying to establish the circumstances of the death but say it does n't appear to be sus

documents.title: northern powerhouse conference : transport investment needed , says council leader
text: on the second day of the northern powerhouse conference in manchester , city council leader , sir richard leese said the north needs investment in rail and transport and councils needs to keep `` banging on about it '' until it is a reality .
sessions later include looking at manufacturing and the digital economy in northern england .
if we take the cities of the north of england , instead of a collection of medium-sized cities we need to start thinking of ourselves as a virtual city of 10 million people , a city of world scale .
we need the transport to turn that into a reality . ''

documents.title: thief steals staff wages from slattery chocolatiers in bury new road , whitefield
text: a thief left a bitter taste in the mouths of chocolatiers after stealing their wages from a staff room .
author: Bury Times

documents.title: arrest after man dies in cheetham hill
text: a man has been arrested after a man in his seventies died after he was hit by a lorry in cheetham hill .
emergency services were called to cheetham hill road just after 14:00 on tuesday .
a man has been arrested on sus of causing death by careless driving .

documents.title: travel : lane closure on m60 anticlockwise
text: heavy traffic and lane closed on exit slip road due to broken down vehicle on m60 anticlockwise at j27 a626 / a560 / b6104 ( portwood roundabout ) .lane one ( of two ) is closed as you go from the main carriageway down to the roundabout .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: oldham 's jack tuohy 'took advantage of girl 's crush '
text: a professional footballer took sexual advantage of a 14-year-old girl who had `` a crush '' on him , a court has heard .
oldham athletic midfielder jack tuohy , 20 , first met the `` football mad '' girl at a schools tournament hosted by the league one club in 2015 .
the prosecution told manchester minshull street crown court he went on to groom the teenager after `` bullying '' her into meeting him .
mr tuohy denies five sexual offences against a child .

documents.title: metrolink opens second city crossing
text: manchester 's newest tram line - the second city crossing - will open this weekend .
it has taken three years to complete and caused some disruption for commuters and businesses in the city centre .
the line links up st peter 's square with victoria .
metrolink 's second city crossing opens on sunday - but have a sneak preview of the ride , filmed from driver 's view thanks to tfgm .
great video but when will the trams run right through from the airport instead of terminating at cornbrooke
good question for @ twitterid
hi .
as of sunday they will run through to deansgate from the airport , before going through to victoria asap .
are there any plans for extension into the south-east of manchester , like a stockport line ?
we 're looking at many options for future expansion of the network .
the next stage is the trafford park line .
trafford , interesting .

could have invested in the existing service .

documents.title: calls for bolton council leader to stand down
text: more than 3,000 people have signed a petition calling for the resignation of bolton council 's leader - clifford morris .
it follows protests against a controversial £ 300,000 grant awarded to a local firm of solicitors , asons .
the council said it was a legitimate way of keeping hundreds of jobs in the town centre , but some local people think it is an `` inappropriate '' use of funds .

documents.title: thieves steal £ 12,000 worth of handbags from john lewis store - the third raid in three months
text: large retailers in stockport have been warned a `` professional '' gang could be targeting their stores - after john lewis was raided for the third time in as many months .
author: Manchester Evening News

documents.title: suicide bomber behind mosul attack grew up in manchester
text: a british is fighter , originally from manchester , who died in a suicide bomb attack on iraqi forces in mosul is a former guantanamo bay detainee , the bbc understands .
the self-styled islamic state group said two days ago that abu-zakariya al-britani detonated a car bomb at an iraqi army base in tal gaysum , south-west of mosul .
he is believed to have been originally known as ronald fiddler .
fiddler , 50 , was sent to guantanamo bay in 2002 .

documents.title: 'man city need aguero now more than ever '
text: 'man city need aguero now more than ever '
author: Phil McNulty
Chief football writer

documents.title: football : man city rally to beat monaco 5-3
text: manchester city came from behind twice to secure a crucial two-goal advantage after a classic champions league last-16 tie against monaco at etihad stadium .

on a night of fluctuating fortunes and thrilling football , pep guardiola 's side were on the preci in this tournament before dragging themselves back to ensure they go into the return in monaco with a priceless lead .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: weather : mostly dry
text: fine and mostly dry for many , with spells of sunshine likely for much of the day , especially in the north .
however , cloudy skies prevailing across the far south , accompanied by outbreaks of rain at times .
breezy .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: good morning
text: hello and welcome to greater manchester live .
we 're here with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather from across the 10 boroughs and east cheshire .
to share news , tip-offs , photographs or anything else , you can contact the team via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Rachael Lazaro
Reporter, BBC News Online
